title: Is there any function in vb.net plungin for "MatchMeshEdge" function?
question:
As the question, please tell me if there is any related function available in 
vb.net
, because I want to run parallel to speed up

code_blocks.code:
Private Sub RunScript(ByVal mesh As Mesh, ByRef A As Object)
    mesh.MatchEdges(RhinoDocument.ModelAbsoluteTolerance, False)
    mesh.RebuildNormals()
    a = mesh
End Sub
code_blocks.author: Mahdiyar
